text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. New Moon. Explodes, poisoning the strongest Zombie with headwear, or closest. Spawns uncommonly. Drops Shadow Plant Food
$(br)$(#bd951a)Despite being such a poisonous fungus, Shadow-shroom is nonetheless a total cutie-pie.

pages.title: ☁ Conceal Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Poisons a zombie near them and their Shadow Plant Food makes shadowy plants.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. New Moon Powered Form. Explodes, poisoning Zombies.

pages.title: ☁ Conceal Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Shadow-shroom's Shadow Form. Poisons all Zombies in range.
